channel.description: Message Dispatch Process of determining which version of a method to execute Java: method signature (name and argument types) Python: method name only Based on the original object, not data type Python class Canine: def bark(self) -> None: print("I'm scary") class Dog(Canine): def bark(self) -> None: print("I'm friendly") class GuideDog(Dog): def bark(self) -> None: print("I'm helpful") Java public class Canine { public void bark() { System.out.println("I'm scary"); } }
